description.en: One day at school, Youta sees someone strange entering his school. Out of nowhere this being appears next to him and makes him fall from the 3rd floor. He lands in a strange world, where beings like dragons exist! Youta meets a young paladin, and discovers that he is the only man inhabiting that planet, and that its inhabitants are extremely 'weak' to his presence. Could this be paradise?
description.ja: 異世界に迷い込んだ男子高生・太多陽太は、森の中で美少女騎士・ルーミと出会う。そこは少女だけが存在する世界。神の化身からルーミとの交尾を命じられる陽太。触れられただけで極限まで発情したルーミは‥‥!?
description.es-la: “Por favor, apareate conmigo”. En un mundo extraño, Youta Tada es atacado por una hermosa chica caballero en celo. Solamente monstruos temidos y chicas hermosas viven en este mundo.¡El único hombre es Youta Tada! ¿¡Es esto el cielo o el infierno para Youta!?
description.pt-br: Em um dia na escola Youta vê alguém estranho entrando na escola, do nada este ser aparece ao seu lado e o joga do 3º andar! Porém ele vai parar em um mundo estranho, onde seres parecidos com dragões existem! Youta conhece uma jovem paladina, e descobre que é o único homem habitando aquele planeta, e que suas habitantes são extremamente ‘fracas’ a sua presença… seria este o paraíso?!

description.en:
Two women who are just friends make a pact… "If both of us are still single in 5 years, let's get married." Five years later, they meet again, and their married life begins.  
  
[Serialised in Yuri Hime starting in November 2020.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-10-17/donuts-under-a-crescent-moon-shio-usui-launches-new-manga-in-november/.165322)
description.ja: 「5年後お互い独り身だったら結婚しよう」そんな友達との約束が実を結び、結婚することになったくるみと瑠璃子。恋人だったわけじゃない”ともだち”同士の二人の結婚生活は、何から何まで初めてづくし。
description.ko:
"5년 후에도 독신이면 우리 둘이 결혼하자.”
‘친구’와의 약속이 결실을 맺어, 결혼하게 된 쿠루미와 루리코.
연인이 아닌 ‘친구’끼리의 결혼.
두 사람의 결혼생활은 하나부터 열까지 서툴기만 하다.
약지에 끼워진 결혼 반지가 언제쯤 익숙해질지......
그것은 앞으로 두 사람에게 달려있다.
description.pt-br:
Duas mulheres que são apenas 
amigas fazem uma promessa... 
"Se nós duas ainda estivermos 
solteiras em 5 anos, vamos nos 
casar." Cinco anos depois, elas se 
reencontram, e as suas vidas 
de casadas começa.

description.en:
With her fierce eyes and sharp impression, and wary of everyone, 'Ahn Se-young' is a woman to watch out for.
Everyone is cautious around her, but a lone boy stands in front of her.
"I like you, go out with me!"
"......What?!"
Se-young is taken aback at the sudden confession of love, but this was just the beginning...
The tug-of-war between 'Ahn Se-young', who shows an unexpected side to her as you get closer, and 'Nam Ho-yeol', the straightforward guy who tries to break down her impenetrable facade, begins now!
description.ko:
사나운 눈매와 날카로운 인상으로 주변 사람들에게 경계를 받고 있는 요주의 그녀 '안세영'.
모두가 경계심을 놓지 못할 때 그녀의 앞에 한 남자애가 마주선다.
"나 너 좋아해, 나랑 사귀자!"
"......뭐?!"
난데없는 사랑고백에 진땀이 빠지는 세영, 하지만 이건 시작에 불과했으니...
가까이 다가갈수록 반전의 모습을 보이는 그녀 '안세영'과
그 모습을 빈틈없이 파고 들려는 직진남 '남호열'의 줄다리기가 지금 시작된다!

altTitles.ja: ＧＥ～グッドエンディング～

description.en:
Utsumi is your everyday student. He is also a boy that has always had a strong sense of what is right in the world. With nothing but innocence and a mind that longs for his "significant other," Utsumi takes on one of the toughest subjects: love. With the help of the devious and mysterious Kurokawa Yuki, will Utsumi learn how to be fortunate in the game of love? Only through the ups and downs of real life, and the assistance of his friends, will Utsumi be able to take a bite out of life and learn just what love is.

- Alternative English: [Kodansha US](https://kodansha.us/series/ge-good-ending)

description.en: Kaya-chan is an infamous problem child in kindergarten. However, when Chie-sensei is assigned to look after her, she finds out that Kaya has an ability... Presenting to you, the strongest horror action series set in a kindergarten!!

altTitles.ja: バガボンド

description.en:
Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.
description.es:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.

description.en:
The jewelry store Rohstein is an unconventional shop where “a maid sells jewels”.

Off of the main street, the shop is visited by an elderly gentleman, a noble, an actress, a poor student, and all sorts of people who have heard the rumors of it. When they hold the jewels selected by the maid, their own lives also begin to shine.

A tale spun by jewels and people.

With dainty illustrations, a jewel-bestowing short story series.
description.ja:
宝石商「ローシュタイン」は“メイドが宝石を売る”一風変わった品揃えのお店。
大通りから外れたその店には、老紳士、貴族、女優、貧乏学生と噂を聞きつけたさまざまな人が訪れる。
メイドが選んだ宝石を手にしたとき、彼ら自身の人生もまた輝きだす。
宝石と人が紡ぐ物語。
ーー繊細なイラストで贈る珠玉の連作短編。

altTitles.ja: 灼熱カバディ

description.en:
The story centres on first-year high school student Tatsuya Yoigoshi, a former ace soccer player who dislikes sports. 
He gets invited to join the team for an Indian contact sport called Kabaddi. 
He scoffs at the idea at first but becomes interested after watching a kabaddi practice.

Wanderer, imposing, somewhere in the vast void of space, Rendezvous awaits! The only space station built inside a living being, where the best scientists, warriors, explorers and engineers of the galaxy live.
Follow the adventures of the Rendezvaj against the galaxy's major enemy; The Raccoon-race "preservation" Federation in this epic Space Opera.
description.es-la:
Errante, imponente, en algún lugar del vasto vacío espacial, Rendezvous espera! La única estación espacial construida dentro de un ser vivo, que aloja a los mejores científicos, guerreros, exploradores e ingenieros de la galaxia.
Sigue las aventuras de un grupo de Rendezvaj contra su mayor enemigo; La Federación de “Conservación” de la raza Mapache en esta épica ópera spacial.

description.en:
Noel, a youth who admires his grandfather, who was hailed as a hero, and aspires to be the strongest Seeker. But his Job that appeared in the appraisal, was the support class Talker.

Talker is a peaky job with the weakest individual abilities. A job that could never become the strongest.

"If I create the strongest clan and become the clan master, then I’ll essentially be the strongest."

Thinking that, Noel worked hard persistently to fulfil his ambition. On the other hand, the merciless methods he employed for the sake of his ambition were acknowledged by everyone as the path of "evil." However, Noel’s distinct talent attracted many powerful people and they began to gather under him…

This is the story of how the most evil Talker, who seeks to be the strongest, subdues his allies and creates the strongest clan in the world.
description.vi: Đây là hành trình vươn tới đỉnh cao giới truy thủ của kẻ sinh ra mang trong mình một trong những chức nghiệp được đánh giá là yếu nhất - Noel Stollen.
description.es-la:
Noel, un joven que admira a su abuelo, que fue aclamado como un gran héroe, aspira a ser un buscador fuerte como él. Pero el trabajo que apareció en su evaluación, fue la clase de soporte “Talker” (Orador).

Talker es un trabajo con las habilidades individuales más débiles. Un trabajo que nunca podría convertirse en el más fuerte.

「Si creo el clan más fuerte y me convierto en el líder del clan, entonces esencialmente seré el más fuerte」

Pensando eso, y gracias al apoyo de su abuelo, Noel trabajó y entrenó arduamente por años con el objetivo de cumplir su ambición. Por otro lado, los métodos crueles que empleó por el bien de su ambición fueron reconocidos como inhumanos. Sin embargo, el talento distintivo de Noel atrajo a muchas personas poderosas y comenzaron a reunirse debajo de él...

Esta es la historia del Talker más despiadado que busca ser el más fuerte, forjando aliados para crear el clan más fuerte del mundo.

altTitles.ja: 世界最速のレベルアップ

description.en:
It’s been 20 years since dungeons suddenly appeared in the world. Humanity got supernatural powers like Level, Status, and Skill.

Dreaming of becoming rich quickly, Amane Rin, an adventurer challenged to capture dungeons. Even though he possessed a skill unique to even adventurers, Transfer within dungeon, he was deemed as incompetent because of the poor usability of the skill. However, the turning point for him came.

After a year since he started capturing dungeons, Transfer within dungeon evolved with a level up. As a result, Rin became an existence unrestricted by the rules of the dungeon. Rin, who became the only singularity, continued to level up with overwhelming speed and climbed to the strongest position in the world in the blink of an eye.

This is the story of a boy who was looked down upon because of his incompetence but eventually became the strongest in the world.

description.en: The most dangerous prey... When the most accomplished assassin on Earth meets his end just before retirement, he finds himself standing before a goddess. Her world is headed for disaster, and she has need of his particular set of skills. Armed with powerful new abilities and decades of deadly knowledge, he begins his second life as Lugh, young scion of the Tuatha Dé clan of assassins. His mission: to find and eliminate the strongest individual in this world—the hero!
description.ja: 世界一の暗殺者が異世界に転生。そこで請け負ったミッションは【人類に厄災をもたらすと予言された《勇者》を殺すこと】。前世の暗殺スキルと異世界の魔法を組み合わせ、彼は史上最強の暗殺者へと成長していく――。
description.ru:
Великолепный убийца, решил уйти в отставку, по случаю своей старости. Но его познания в темных делах и стратегические навыки ведения убийств не давали покоя влиятельным лицам. И потому случаю они "заказали" старика.   
В результате тот погиб, весь в мыслях о "жизни по ту сторону".   
Но это только начало его дальнейшей судьбы, ведь его талант приглянулся настоящей богине!   
И теперь ассасин получит новое тело, ну и главное задание его жизни - убить героя…

altTitles.ja: 新ルパン三世

description.en:
Lupin the Third and his motley crew return in Shin Lupin III! This time, several of the stories are either brand new or adapted from or to the Lupin anime, and the beginning story was even animated by itself several years later!  
  
Lupin the Third is the grandson of the famous literary thief Arsène Lupin, and his partners in crime include the sharpshooter Jigen Daisuke, the stoic samurai Goemon Ishikawa the Thirteenth, and the on-again-off-again lover/enemy Fujiko Mine. Their goal is to outwit enemies bigger than themselves while nabbing the world's rarest and most important items, while also outwitting the dogged Inspector Zenigata, who's made it his life's work to capture and secure Lupin. In the manga however, his relationship with the titular thief isn't as "respecting to the enemy" as you would expect, as he's attempted multiple times to kill him without shedding a tear!   
  
What kind of sexy exploits will Lupin and his crew get up to next in…Shin Lupin III!

altTitles.ja: めしぬま。

description.en: Iinuma, a somewhat dull salaryman, eats food as his craving drives him! This is an appetite-stimulating gourmet manga where you can just watch him eating his food!
description.vi: Truyện xoay quanh một anh chàng nhân viên văn phòng có vẻ ngoài nhạt nhẽo tên Iinuma với tâm hồn ăn uống, luôn nghĩ đến chuyện măm măm cơm. Iinuma có phần Kanji của chữ “Ii” là 飯 - cũng có thể đọc là “meshi”, trong tiếng Nhật có nghĩa là cơm hoặc thịt. Mọi chuyện tưởng như không có gì để bàn tới nhưng đợi đã, xem biểu cảm khuôn mặt thỏa mãn chạm nóc vì thưởng thức món ngon của cậu ta kìa, có gì đó sao mà… lạ lắm à nghen! Cậu đang… ăn thôi đúng không!?

description.en:
Habuk Peng Family’s best strength, Peng Jihyuk heads to the Nakho Region to save his family that fell into destruction due to the attack of the Demon Sect, but everything was a trap. At the moment of death, he felt the wrath of being the only one left from his beloved family.

‘Again…if you give me a chance…!”

Peng Jihyuk, who thought he was dead, woke up in the body of Young Master Sa, of the Peng Family.

---

description.ko:
하북팽가 최고의 전력, 도왕 팽지혁. 마교의 습격으로 멸문지화에 빠진 가문을 구하러 낙호곡으로 향하지만 모든 것은 함정이었고, 죽음의 순간 자신이 사랑했던 가문에게 버림받았다는 사실에 분노한다.
'다시... 내게 한 번만 더 기회가 주어진다면...!'
죽은 줄 알았던 팽지혁은 방구석 둔재, 하북팽가 사공자의 몸에서 눈을 뜬다.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)
description.ru:
Пэн Джи Хёк — лучший воин семейства Пэн из Хэбэя. Из-за атаки Магё его семейство почти исчезло... Для её спасения он отправляется в дальнее путешествие, во время которого попадает в ловушку. За мгновение до смерти он узнал, что его горячо любимая семья от него отказалась, и пришёл в ярость.
«Если бы у меня был ещё один шанс!..»
Он уже был готов к встрече со смертью, но когда открыл глаза — оказался в теле молодого господина.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)
description.zh:
一代刀王重生废柴四公子！
为报恩逆袭勇斗魔教！
名门彭家的最强战斗力，刀王彭枝奕。为了拯救因魔教的袭击而陷入灭门之灾的彭家，彭枝奕前往落虎谷与魔教教主决战，却发现这一切都是个陷阱。临死之前得知自己被深爱的家族抛弃的彭枝奕愤怒不已。彭枝奕原以为自己死了，没想到却在彭家四公子的身体里重新醒了过来。

description.en:
A twisted girls' love story featuring: A devilish girl hiding behind the mask of an honor student x An ordinary girl who hates losing.

Wakaba Yoshizawa has a childhood friend named Komaki Umezono.

This girl wore the mask of an honor student with good morals who's blessed with both beauty and brains, but in reality she's an evil genius who looked down on people. For the sake of regaining the dignity she lost to Komaki, Wakaba challenges her to a match, but Komaki tells her "Each time I win, I will take one precious thing from you." as a condition!? Every time she loses to the girl she "hates", her true feelings get exposed.

(Source: Young Ace Up)
description.ja:
「嫌い」な彼女に負けるたび、曝け出されるホントの気持ち――。

吉沢わかばの幼馴染、梅園小牧。彼女は、品行方正で才色兼備な優等生の仮面を被った、人を見下す性悪女だった。そんな小牧に奪われた尊厳を取り戻すため、彼女に勝負を挑むわかばだったが、「私が勝ったらわかばの大事なものを一つずつ奪う」という条件をつけられて――!?ファーストキスに始まり、一つ一つ「尊厳」を奪われていく中で、小牧に抱く気持ちが「嫌い」だけでないことに気付きーー？
description.th: อุเมะโซโนะ โคมากิ เพื่อนสมัยเด็กของ โยชิซาวะ วาคาบะ เธอสวมหน้ากากนักเรียนดีเด่นทั้งที่เป็นผู้หญิงชั่วร้าย ที่ชอบดูถูกผู้คน เพื่อกอบกู้ศักดิ์ศรีที่โคมากิแย่งชิงไปจากเธอ วาคาบะ จึงต้องแข่งขันกับเธอ โดยมีเงื่อนไขว่าถ้าชนะ เธอจะพรากสิ่งสำคัญหนึ่งอย่างของวาคาบะไป...!? "ฉันเกลียดเธอ!" ถึงจะเป็นแบบนั้น ทุกครั้งที่พ่ายแพ้ความรู้สึกที่แท้จริงก็ค่อย ๆ ถูกเปิดเผยออกมา
description.es-la:
¡Una distorsionada historia de amor entre la estudiante modelo con una máscara demoníaca y la chica común que no se rinde!

Wakaba Yoshizawa, la amiga de la infancia de Wakaba, Komaizumi Komaki. Ella era una chica malvada que llevaba una máscara de estudiante modelo perfecta y talentosa, que miraba por encima del hombro a los demás. Wakaba desafía a Komaki para recuperar su dignidad que le fue arrebatada, pero se le pone una condición: "Si gano, tomaré una cosa importante de Wakaba una por una" ¡Cada vez que pierde contra ella, revela sus verdaderos sentimientos! ¡Una emocionante historia de amor entre chicas que ganó el Premio de Oro en el 28vo Concurso Sneaker Award, ahora en formato de cómic!
description.pt-br:
Uma história de amor distorcida entre garotas: uma garota diabólica escondida por trás da máscara de uma estudante exemplar x uma garota comum que odeia perder.

Wakaba Yoshizawa tem uma amiga de infância chamada Komaki Umezono.

Essa garota usava a máscara de uma estudante exemplar com boas virtudes, abençoada com beleza e inteligência, mas na realidade ela é uma gênio do mal que despreza as pessoas. Para recuperar a dignidade perdida para Komaki, Wakaba desafia-a para um duelo, mas Komaki lhe diz: "Cada vez que eu ganhar, vou tirar algo precioso de você." como condição!? Cada vez que ela perde para a garota que "odeia", seus verdadeiros sentimentos são expostos.

description.en:
The Earth's existence is under threat once more as Itarim, the gods of other universes, seek to fill the void left by the Absolute Being. 

Sung Jinwoo has no choice but to send Beru, the shadow ant king, to awaken his son's powers and start him on the journey he once took. 

Suho must conquer the shadow dungeon and earn his place in the world of hunters as he navigates through a new world against a new evil looking to swallow the world whole.
description.ko:
줄거리

평범한 대학생으로 살아가던 성수호 죽음을 앞둔 순간, 잠들어 있던 그의 특별한 혈통이 깨어난다!

“일어나라.”

죽음을 거스르고 지배하는 헌터, 그가 선보이는 새로운 레벨업을 주목하라!

* 이 작품은 웹툰 <나 혼자만 레벨업>의 세계관을 이어받은 작품입니다.
description.pt-br:
A existência da Terra está ameaçada novamente, por Itarim, os deuses de outros universos, buscam preencher o vazio deixado pelo Ser Absoluto.

Sung Jinwoo não tem outra opção senão enviar Beru, o rei das formigas das sombras, para despertar os poderes de seu filho e iniciar sua jornada, como ele fez antes.

Suho precisa conquistar a masmorra das sombras e ganhar seu lugar no mundo dos caçadores, enquanto enfrenta um novo mal que ameaça engolir o mundo inteiro.

A historia de um jovem soldado da Finlândia nesta guerra de inverno, ele foi um herói para seus amigos, familiares e para o povo da Finlândia contra a ameaça comunista!!
Ele é o apelidado de “Morte Branca”, Simo Hayha!!!

Um mangá ONE SHOT de Simo Hayha!

description.en:
This is a heart-pounding love comedy between "Manager Tsuruse'', a female boss who is scary at work but whose hobbies are cute clothes(?!), and "Tsukinawa-kun'', a new male employee who joins the company mid-career!

There is also a FANBOX version, a collection of 0.5 "Naughty" stories: 
[Kowai Onna Joushi ga Nuidara H de Kawaikatta Hanashi - FANBOX 0.5 Matome【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/ef970af6-8357-43bb-9bd1-fe09dba78624/kowai-onna-joushi-ga-nuidara-h-de-kawaikatta-hanashi-fanbox-0-5-matome)

description.en:
Sit back and take in this romantic tale of an angelic heroine and her devoted suitors as they vie for the depths of her love... or not. This story’s about to go through some edits! After an accident, a modern-day college student awakens as the story’s villainess, Melissa Foddebrat. She’s far from anyone’s favorite, but she IS the daughter of the duke. Determined to live it up, this new Melissa is doing things her way — antiquated society, be damned! All idiots, prepare to step aside or perish!

---
A refreshing, unique villainess who's been dropped in the world of a novel, only to overthrow it all! The reason why? She couldn't just stand by and watch the female lead be manipulated by all four shitty male leads. The story of a pragmatic villainess who intends to throw out all the jackasses, the friendly heroine who is equally miffed at said idiots, and a wolf that only yearns for her!
description.es:
Una villana estimulante y única fue lanzada al mundo de una novela, ¡sólo para derribarlo todo! ¿Por qué? Ella simplemente no pudo quedarse quieta viendo a la protagonista siendo manipulada por la mierda de hombres protagonistas. ¡La historia de una villana pragmática que se da a la tarea de deshacerse de todos esos imbéciles, la heroína amistosa que está igualmente harta de esos idiotas y de un lobo que desea a la villana y a nadie más!

---

description.fr:
Réincarnée dans un roman à l’eau de rose, la voici qui endosse le rôle de méchante de l’histoire! Mais hors de question de se laisser marcher sur les pieds, que ce soit par l’héroïne ou ses prétendants. La première étape? Rompre ses fiançailles avec le prince héritier coureur de jupons. La seconde? Remettre tout le monde à sa place. Et la troisième? Qu’on lui fiche la paix!

description.id:
Aku menjadi pemeran antagonis! Apa aku membencinya? Tidak! Aku malah suka. Putri Duke: Pengangguran kaya. Ini adalah kesempatan terbaik untuk menikmati hidup. Aku harus mengubah cerita asli dan menjalani kehidupan yang aku inginkan! Tidak lama setelah bangun sebagai antagonis, aku melihat putra mahkota, tunangan sekaligus pemeran utama pria, berselingkuh. Apa aku menangis? Tentu saja... tidak! Air mataku terlalu sayang untuk menangisi si sampah itu! Dibanding menangis, aku malah berteriak: “Yang Mulia, anda sampah, ya?”

description.it:
Sono diventata la cattiva di un romanzo! Mi dispiace? No! Lo trovo piuttosto interessante. La figlia di un duca = una persona ricca senza lavoro. Come posso perdere un'occasione come questa ?! Questa è la migliore occasione per godersi la vita. Dovrei buttare via la trama principale e vivere la vita come voglio! Non molto tempo dopo essermi svegliata come la cattiva, ho visto il mio fidanzato, il protagonista maschile del romanzo, il principe, tradirmi. L'ho visto abbracciare una dama diversa da me e sorridendo così felicemente. Ero in lacrime... Ahahah! Stavo solo scherzando, non ho pianto! Le mie lacrime valgono troppo per essere sprecate per quella spazzatura. Invece delle lacrime, ho gridato: "Altezza, non crede di essere solo spazzatura?" Il personaggio principale con una personalità di una bibita rinfrescante! La protagonista di una shoujo per ragazze che stravolgerà completamente la storia principale! Perché? Perché è uno spreco per una ragazza essere circondata da questi uomini.

---

description.ko:
소설 속 희대의 악녀에 빙의했다! 싫냐고? 아니? 좋은데?
공작영애 = 돈 많은 백수인 것을 내가 마다할 리가! 꿀이나 빨면서 여유롭게 살기 딱 좋지 않은가? 원작같은 건 다 떨쳐버리고 나의 삶을 사는거야!

그렇게 다짐했던 내가 이 몸에 빙의한지 얼마 되지 않아 목격한 것은 나의 약혼남이자 원작의 남주인공인 '황태자 이안'의 불륜 현장이었다. 

내가 아닌 다른 여자를 품에 안고 시시덕거리는 그를 보며 나는 눈물……따윈 개뿔, 나오지도 않더라. 내 눈물은 비싸서 저런 쓰레기에게 흘리기엔 아깝거든. 눈물 대신 깊은 빡침을 담은 목소리로 물었다.

"전하는 개자식인가요?"

고구마밭에 떨어진 역대급 사이다 여주! 환장하는 원작을 뒤집어 엎기위한 걸크러쉬 그녀!
이유? 여주가 똥차같은 남주들에게 휘둘리기엔 너무 아까웠거든.

원작 여주에게 꼬이는 똥차들을 치우는 그녀와, 그녀만을 바라보는 늑댕이 한마리의 이야기!

description.ru:
Я стала злодейкой любовного романа. Думаете, меня что-то не устраивает? Нет, всё просто прекрасно. Статус дочери герцога даёт возможность жить в роскоши и комфорте, и я собираюсь извлечь всю выгоду из своего нынешнего положения. Но хотя я не хочу идти по пути антагонистки, белой и пушистой тоже не буду. Мой жених изменил мне с главной героиней, поэтому я перепишу оригинальную историю и поставлю всех на колени. Эти ублюдки не стоят моих слёз.

description.th:
เมื่อฉันได้เกิดอุบัติเหตุ เข้าไปอยู่ในนิยายเรื่องหนึ่งที่ฉันเคยอ่าน ซึ่งร่างที่ฉันอยู่นั้น เธอเป็นนางร้ายของเรื่อง ที่พยายามจะคว้าหัวใจขององค์ชายที่เป็นคู่หมั้นของเธอให้ได้ ซึ่งฉันเคยไม่ชอบเธอเอามากๆ แต่เมื่อได้เข้ามาอยู่แล้วถึงได้รู้ว่าโลกในนี้มันไม่ได้นำเสนอในทุกๆ ด้าน และด้านที่ฉันเห็นเป็นอีกด้านหนึ่งของนิยาย ซึ่งปรากฎว่ายูริ นางเอกตัวจริงของนิยายที่แสนจะน่าอิจฉาที่มีเหล่าผู้ชายมารุมล้อม จริงๆ แล้วเธอไม่ได้ชอบแบบนี้เลย ผู้ชายหลายคนต่างก็มีนิสัยอีกด้านหนึ่งซึ่งเป็นด้านมืดที่ไม่ได้ถ่ายทอดออกมาให้ได้อ่าน และฉัน เมลิซ่า นางร้ายคนนี้ก็จะเป็นนายร้ายให้สมกับชื่อ กำจัดพวกผู้ชายไปให้พ้นทางยูริให้ได้ โดยเฉพาะคู่หมั้นของฉัน

description.tr:
Bir romanın kötü karakteri oldum! Peki bundan nefret ediyor muyum? Hayır! Oldukça hoş buluyorum. Bir Dük’ün kızıyım; işi olmayan zengin biri. Böyle bir şansı nasıl kaçırabilirim?! Bu, hayatın tadını çıkarmak için en iyi şans. Novel’in ana konusuna uymayıp hayatımı nasıl istiyorsam öyle yaşamalıyım! Kötü karakter olarak uyandıktan kısa bir süre sonra, nişanlım, Novel’ın erkek ana karakteri olan veliaht prensin beni aldattığına şahit oldum. Onu, başka bir leydiyi kucaklarken gördüğümde çok parlak gülümsüyordu. Gözyaşlarına boğuldum… Şakaydı, ağlamadım! Gözyaşlarım o çöp herif için harcanamayacak kadar değerli. Ağlamak yerine, “Majesteleri siz bir or*spu çocuğu musunuz?” diye bağırdım. Ferahlatıcı bir sodaymışçasına bir kişiliğe sahip olan bir ana karakter! Kadın ana karakter ezici kişiliğiyle hikayeyi tamamen reddedecek! Neden mi? Çünkü bir kızın ucuz arabalarla çevirili olması israftan başka bir şey değildir. ( Ucuz arabalar = Erkekler)

Я стала лиходійкою любовного роману. Думаєте, мене щось не влаштовує? Ні, все чудово. Статус дочки герцога дає можливість жити в розкоші та комфорті, і я маю намір отримати всю вигоду зі свого нинішнього становища. Але, хоча я не хочу йти шляхом антагоністки, білої і пухнастої теж не буду. Мій наречений зрадив мені з головною героїнею, тому я перепишу оригінальну історію та поставлю всіх на коліна. Uma vilã diferente e única que foi lançada no mundo de um romance, apenas para derrubar tudo! Por quê? Ela não podia simplesmente ficar parada vendo a protagonista ser manipulada pelos quatro protagonistas masculinos de merda. A história de uma vilã pragmática que pretende expulsar todos os imbecis, a heroína amigável que fica igualmente irritada com os ditos idiotas e um lobo que apenas anseia pela vilã!

description.zh-hk:
我穿越成為小說中的絕世惡女了!
難不難過?不，我高興得要命呢!
公爵千金 = 多金又閒閒沒事幹，瘋了才拒絕!
可以吃大餐又活得消遙自在不是很好嗎?
擺脫原著的設定，活出屬於我的人生吧!

我下定決心後不久，便目擊了我的未婚夫，
也就是小說男主角——「皇太子伊安」的出軌現場。
看到他抱著另一個女人有說有笑，
我的眼淚就掉了下來...才怪，我根本就哭不出來!
為那種垃圾落下我珍貴的眼淚實在太浪費了!
於是我怒氣沖沖地問他...

「殿下，你是狗嗎?」

掉進鬱悶世界的超級豪邁女主角!
為了推翻荒謬的原著而來，充滿Girl Crush的她!
原因?當然是因為那些爛男人配不上女主角!

一個努力擺脫爛男人糾纏的女主角，
以及一名眼裡只有她的狼人的故事!

---

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

Jake, a seemingly average office worker, unexpectedly finds himself thrust into a fantasy world teeming with dangers and opportunities. Rather than succumbing to fear, Jake thrives in this unfamiliar realm. As he navigates the expansive multiverse, his power grows and he transforms—evolving from a mundane office worker into a true apex hunter.

202X.

In the back alleys of Seoul, South Korea… He looked down at the heroes under his feet—the heroes who adorned themselves in a variety of colorful clothes, as if they were K-pop idols on TV. Those heroes? They were crawling beneath him, their gaudy outfits smeared with dirt. That was the true nature of being a hero. He hoped the individuals before him learned that lesson well. It was time to ensure they never forgot it. As a magical girl, he swung his hammer down. This is a bright story. The story of a man reclaiming his light.

With his innate spiritual abilities, Kang Yeon-woo was destined to become either a shaman or an entertainer. After surviving a life-threatening event, he gains the ability to extend his life by resolving grudges.

His life takes a complete turn when he meets top star Kwon Sung-hyun while handling a request
description.pt-br: Kang Yeon-woo, que nasceu com uma magia natural e estava destinado a se tornar um xamã ou artista, tem a capacidade de ganhar longevidade resolvendo seu ressentimento após superar o perigo da morte. Depois disso, a vida de Yeon-woo é completamente mudada pela estrela Kwon Seong-hyeon, que ele conhece enquanto resolve um pedido.

title.en: Pest ga Aketara Asobimashou! ~Chuusei Europa Sekai to Gendai Bunmei Slow Life~

altTitles.ja: ペストが明けたら遊びましょう！ ～中世ヨーロッパ世界と現代文明スローライフ～

altTitles.en: Let's Hang Out When the Black Plague is Over!: A Slow Life of Modern Civilization in the World of Middle Age Europe

description.en: In 14th Century Middle Age Europe, the spread of the Black Plague has led baker Rachel Becker to move from the city to a village. There, she meets Ema Müller, a "witch" who claims to come from "another world" 700 years into the future, bringing with her modern technology that feels like "magic" to the people of the middle ages...
description.ja: ペストの蔓延により暗黒の時代へと突入した中世ヨーロッパ。田舎町へと引っ越してきたレイチェルは、不思議な道具を操るという“魔女”に出会う。彼女が使う「現代技術」は、中世の人間にとって魔法のようで──?

title.en: Orenchi ni Kita Onna Kishi to Inakagurashi Surukotoninatta Ken

altTitles.ja: 俺んちに来た女騎士と 田舎暮らしすることになった件

altTitles.en: How I Came to Live Out in the Country with a Female Knight Who Showed Up at My Place
The Matter Regarding the Female Knight Who Came to Live With Me in the Countryside
Regarding That We Decided to Live in the Countryside With The Female Knight Who Came to Us

description.en: Saeki Kanji, 32 years old and still single, is living in the Japanese countryside, which is in decline. After graduating from university with a degree in economics he took a job as a salaryman in a leading company in Tokyo, but retired when he inherited the family farm in Mitsuyama village when his parents passed on. He soon took to the life of a simple farmer. One day a beautiful woman wearing full body armor came to his door begging to stay the night. She claimed to be royalty from another world and is unable to return there. She ends up living with Kanji and helping out the local agriculture situation.
description.ja:
とある片田舎で農業を営む佐伯莞爾（32歳）。一人気ままにのんびり田舎暮らしを楽しんでいたら、ある夜とんでもない訪問者が！剣！甲冑！どこからどう見ても「女騎士」…異世界から来たという彼女となりゆきで一緒に暮らすことになったが、前途は多難で…。

description.pt:
Saeki Kanji, 32 anos e ainda solteiro, mora em um campo japonês, que está em declínio. Depois de se formar em economia, ele aceitou um emprego como funcionário assalariado em uma empresa líder em Tóquio, mas teve que sair quando herdou a fazenda da família na vila de Miyama quando seus pais morreram e, assim virando um agricultor. Um dia, uma linda mulher vestindo uma armadura de corpo inteiro veio até a porta dela pedindo para passar a noite, ela alegou ser um membro da realeza do outro mundo e não pode voltar para lá, ela acaba vivendo com Kanji e ajudando ele na situação da agricultura local.

description.en:
Lin Yan, a cold and arrogant female forensic expert, meets Song Yuhan, a righteous and sharp female detective. From being incompatible to becoming friends, they witness the lives of many ordinary people along the way: a young girl who struggles to survive but dies innocently, an old mother who waits for her criminal son to return in the mountains, a timid policeman who faces a gun-wielding robber bravely... 

They fight for the rights of the living, speak for the dead, and vow to uncover the truth that has been silent for years.
Youshou Xihua- a non-canon, spinoff slice-of-life mini-theater of the Youshou Yan Manga unrelated to the main plotline.

altTitles.ja: 蟻の王

description.en: A talented nobody feels as if there's no challenge to him in this life. He feels as if life is too easy. But little does he know, his background actually holds more than he ever wished for. Can he face his destiny and accept what has been laid before him?

title.en: Tamaranai no wa Koi na no ka

altTitles.ja: たまらないのは恋なのか

altTitles.en: Is It Because of Love That I Can't Resist?

description.en: Misuzu became a delinquent through a trivial chance and spends his days getting into fights. One day, Misuzu finds Kitahara, an honor student in a special class, getting involved with some delinquents and helps him out. Kitahara then tries to get involved with Misuzu. Misuzu tries to push him away, saying, "If you get involved with me, the people around you will leave you," but his feelings are wavering...?

title.en: I'm in Love with the Villainess

altTitles.ja: 私の推しは悪役令嬢。

altTitles.zh: 我的首推是恶役大小姐

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的首推是惡役大小姐

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shǒutuī shì è yì dà xiǎojiě

altTitles.th: ทำไงดีเกมนี้นางร้ายน่ารัก

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi no Oshi wa Akuyaku Reijou.

altTitles.es-la: Mi Oshi Es Una Villa Noble

description.de:
Oohashi Rei - eigentlich eine ganz normale Büroangestellte - wacht eines Tages im Körper der Protagonistin ihres absoluten Lieblingsspiels "Revolution" auf. Eigentlich geht es in dem Spiel darum, mit einem von drei absolut wundervollen Prinzen zusammenzukommen. Ein klassisches Otome-Game, und wenn es nach Rei geht, auch das mit Abstand beste.  
Ihr Hauptinteresse lag dabei jedoch nicht etwa an einem der männlichen Charaktere, sondern an Claire François, der Antagonistin des Spiels.

Wird Rei es schaffen, eine romantische Beziehung zu ihr aufzubauen? Wie werden die eigentlichen Stars des Spiels, die drei Prinzen, auf diese Situation reagieren?  
Und was hält Claire überhaupt davon?
description.en:
Ordinary office worker Oohashi Rei wakes up in the body of the protagonist of her favourite otome game, *Revolution*. To her delight, the first person to greet her is also her favourite character, Claire François – the main antagonist of the story!

Now, Rei is determined to romance Claire instead of the game’s male leads. But how will her villainous lady love react to this new courtship?!
description.fr:
Rei Ôhashi, une simple employée de bureau d’une petite entreprise, se retrouve soudainement dans le corps de l’héroïne de son jeu vidéo de drague préféré, Revolution.
Maintenant sous le nom de Rae Taylor, elle est prête à accomplir son objectif.
Passer du bon temps avec les princes du jeu ? Non.
Son cœur appartient à la méchante de l’histoire, Claire François.
Bien décidée à la chérir et à rester à ses côtés, sa nouvelle vie commence dans un monde empreint de magie !
description.id: Seorang pegawai kantor biasa, Oohashi Rei, bereinkarnasi sebagai seorang Heroine bernama Rei Taylor di Game Otome favoritnya, "Revolution". Kebetulan lagi, orang pertama yang menyambutnya adalah karakter favoritnya, Claire Francois- antagonis dari cerita ini! Kini Rei bertekad untuk membangun hubungan romantis dengan Claire, bukan dengan pemeran utama pria. Lantas, bagaimanakah gadis jahat yang dia cintai akan bereaksi terhadap kemesraan baru ini?!
description.it:
La normale impiegata Oohashi Rei si sveglia nel corpo della protagonista del suo gioco otome preferito, Revolution. Per la sua gioia, la prima persona che incontra è anche il suo personaggio preferito, Claire François, l'antagonista principale della storia! Ora Rei è determinata a perseguire una storia d'amore con Claire piuttosto che con gli interessi amorosi maschili. Ma come reagirà la sua amata antagonista a questo nuovo corteggiamento?!
L'anime debutterà ad ottobre 2023!
Annunciato il manga ufficiale italiano!
description.ja: 乙女ゲーム『Revolution』の世界に、ヒロインのレイ＝テイラーとして転生した社畜OL・大橋零。そんな彼女の推しは攻略対象の王子たち…ではなく、悪役令嬢・クレア＝フランソワだった!　前世でゲームをやりこんでいたレイは、その知識と愛で、クレアとお近づきになることができるのか？
description.es-la: Oohashi Rei, una trabajadora de oficina ordinaria se despierta en el cuerpo de la protagonista de su juego otome favorito, "Revolution". Para su deleite, la primera persona en saludarla es también su personaje favorito, Claire Francois, ¡la principal antagonista de la historia! Ahora, Rei está decidida a enamorarse de Claire en lugar de los protagonistas masculinos del juego. ¿Pero cómo reaccionará la villana ante este nuevo cortejo?

altTitles.ja: 彼女のカレラ
My Favorite Carrera

description.en: The main character’s father passes away. The will states that each of the three siblings receive a portion of the father’s wealth. The main character receives a Porsche Carrera. She doesn’t know what a Porsche Carrera looks like, didn’t know the car company Porsche, can’t drive a manual and had absolutely no interest in cars, at the time.

The talentless idol trainee Sang-Jun. The day he spoke about transferring entertainment companies with his director, Sang-Jun recieved the book, and unlocks access to the talent library. , are one of many talent books he borrowed from the library to gain talent.

Great, with this talent I’m going to become a top star!
description.ko:
재능 없는 아이돌 연습생 상준. 기획사 실장에게 소속사 이전을 권유 받은 어느 날, 상준은 <1만 시간의 법칙> 책을 통해‘재능 서고’에 들어가게 된다.<신이 내린 목소리>, <유연한 댄스 머신> 재능 서고의 책을 대여해 하나 둘 실력을 키워가는 상준. 

좋아, 이 재능으로 꼭 탑스타가 될 거야!

description.en:
A man who reincarnated in another world as a 9th class wizard and retired after saving the continent from a dragon war. He decides to open a small restaurant in the countryside, but his routine is anything but ordinary. 

On the second floor of his restaurant, there lives a black dragon who has transformed into a woman, named Rurin. She is greedy, cute and loyal to him, but also ignorant and clueless about the human world. 

They live a fun and warm life, serving customers, solving problems and growing violets in the garden.
description.ko:
요리사를 꿈꾸던 내가 사고로 이세계에 떨어졌다.

몬스터와 마법이 넘쳐나는 판타지 세계이지만 여기라고 식당을 못할 건 없잖아?

그러나 전쟁으로 인해 이세계에 들어오자마자 군대에 끌려가게 되고,
...

altTitles.en: Return of the Unrivaled Spear Knight
Return of the Legendary Spear Knight

altTitles.pt: Retorno do lendário cavaleiro da lança

altTitles.es: El retorno del legendario caballero de la lanza

altTitles.th: การกลับมาของอัศวินผู้ใช้หอกแห่งยุค

altTitles.ja: 歴代級槍騎士の回帰

altTitles.vi: Sự Trở Lại Của Hiệp Sĩ Giáo

altTitles.es-la: El Regreso del Inigualable Caballero de la Lanza

description.en:
Joshua Sanders, the legendary spearman who ended the brutal civil war, shattered the belief that one must wield a sword to be a master knight.

He fought in the service of his friend, Emperor Caesar van Briton, but it is all for naught when his fearful comrades try to kill him. He’s on the brink of death when his trusty weapon, Lugia, shines and propels him back to the stables of his childhood.

With his mighty spear in hand, Joshua is dead set on revenge in this life!
description.es: El invicto caballero lanza. Una estrella brillante de una casa del Ducado que rompió por completo la lógica común de que un caballero debe usar una espada. El gran héroe que puso fin a la larga guerra civil del imperio. Su nombre era "Joshua Sanders". El hombre conocido como la Lanza Legendaria del Emperador tosía sangre. De las manos de nada menos que su señor, el emperador César... "César, ¡¡no creas que este será el final !!" Mirando a la muerte a la cara con un círculo mágico de explosión frente a él, la lanza "Lukia" que ha estado con él durante décadas comenzó a brillar... Este lugar familiar... ¿Es el establo en el que solía vivir cuando era niño? ¡Incluso me volví más joven! Lukia, ¿qué eres? ¡Joshua ha vuelto a su infancia! ¡Y ahora comienza la historia de su épica venganza!
description.ko:
무패의 창기사.
기사는 검을 써야만 한다는 고정관념을 철저히 깨부순 
공작 가문의 빛나는 별. 제국의 오랜 내전을 일시에 종식시킨 대영웅. 
그 이름은 바로 '조슈아 샌더스'.

황제의 역대 최강의 창이라고도 불리는 그가 명성에 어울리지 않는     
검붉은 피를 울컥거리고 있었다. 다른 누구도 아닌 자신의 주군, 
카이사르 황제의 손에 의해...
"카이사르, 이렇게 끝날 거라 생각하지 마라!!"
폭발 마법진에 의해 죽음을 앞둔 그 순간, 수십 년을 함께 해온 창 
'루기아'가 엄청난 기운을 내뿜기 시작하는데...
낯이 익은 이곳은 설마... 어렸을 때 살던 마구간?
몸도 어려졌잖아?! 루기아 너 대체 정체가 뭐야?

다시 유년시절로 돌아온 조슈아! 그의 사이다 복수극이 시작된다!
description.ru:
Непревзойденный копейщик.

Стереотип о необходимости владения мечом разрушает ярчайшая звезда из герцогской семьи. Герой, что положил конец войне империи, и имя ему - Джошуа Сандерс.

Несмотря на его величие и репутацию, теперь он полумертвый истекает багрового цвета кровью. Ранен он не кем иным, как рукой собственного императора, - Кайзера...

"Кайзер!.. Не мечтай, что всё закончится так легко!!!".

Последние мгновения смерти сопроводили излияния огромного количества энергии от его соратника - копья, что носило имя "Ругия"...

Я... Помолодел?.. Ругия, что ты, черт возьми, такое?!

Джошуа вернул себе молодое тело, и его месть начнется с этого момента!

altTitles.en: I, the Demon Lord, Took a Slave Elf as My Wife, but How Do I Love Her?

altTitles.fr: Je, un seigneur des démons, ai épousé un elfe esclavagisant, mais comment l'aime-je?

altTitles.ru: Я, Владыка демонов, взял эльфийку в жёны. И как прикажете её любить?
Я, Владыка демонов, взял эльфийку-рабыню в жёны. И как же мне её любить?

altTitles.zh-hk: 身為魔王的我娶了奴隸精靈為妻、該如何表白我的愛？

altTitles.ja: 魔王の俺が奴隷エルフを嫁にしたんだが、どう愛でればいい？

altTitles.ko: 마왕인 내가 노예 엘프를 신부로 삼았는데 어떻게 사랑하면 되지?

altTitles.pt-br: O dilema de um arquidemônio: como amar sua noiva elfa

altTitles.es: Soy un rey demonio y he tomado como esposa a una elfa esclava, ¿cómo puedo amarla?

altTitles.es-la: Soy un rey demonio y he tomado como esposa a una elfa esclava, ¿cómo puedo amarla?

altTitles.en: An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride

description.en: Zagan is feared as an evil mage, he is awkward and has a sharp tongue, and once again had to put down thieves that encroached on his territory when he was researching that morning. In a dark auction, he finds a white slave elf, Nephie, who holds a peerless beauty. Falling in love with her at first sight, he uses his fortune to buy her, but as poor as he is socially, he doesn’t understand how to connect with her. Thus, the clumsy cohabitation of the mage that can’t convey his love, and the slave that pines for her master but doesn’t understand how to bring it up, begins.
description.es: Zagan es temido como un mago malvado, es torpe y tiene una lengua afilada, y una vez más tuvo que acabar con unos ladrones que invadieron su territorio cuando estaba investigando esa mañana. En una oscura subasta, encuentra a una esclava elfa blanca, Nephie, que posee una belleza sin igual. Enamorado de ella a primera vista, utiliza su fortuna para comprarla, pero tan pobre como es socialmente, no entiende cómo relacionarse con ella. Así comienza la torpe convivencia del mago que no sabe transmitir su amor y la esclava que suspira por su amo pero no sabe cómo planteárselo.
description.fr:
Zagan est craint comme mage démoniaque, un jour au marché noir il rencontre une esclave elfe du nom de Nephie. De part sa beauté innocente, il tombe sous son charme et décide de l'acheter. Bien que fortuné d'argent, ses compétences sociales ne le sont pas et il a du mal à savoir comment créer une relation…  
  
C'est parti pour une cohabitation maladroite entre ce maître qui ne sait montrer son amour et cette esclave qui en pince pour lui sans savoir quoi faire.
description.pt: Zagan é temido como um mago do mal, ele é desajeitado e tem uma língua afiada, e mais uma vez teve que acabar com ladrões que invadiram seu território quando ele estava pesquisando naquela manhã. Em um leilão clandestino, ele encontra uma elfa branco, Nephie, que possui uma beleza incomparável e estava sendo vendida como uma escrava. Apaixonando-se por ela à primeira vista, ele usa sua fortuna para comprá-la, mas sendo horrível socialmente, ele não entende como se conectar com ela. Assim, a desajeitada coabitação do mago que não pode transmitir seu amor, e a escrava que anseia por seu mestre, mas não sabe como agira, começa.

description.en:
“I was given a building as an inheritance?”

From a nobody who does all kinds of odd jobs and lived a hard life, he was given a chance to become a landlord right in the middle of Gangnam!

But, the condition for this inheritance is to ‘operate a restaurant for 5 years.’

‘Moreover, I can sense a chill down my spine thanks to the weird customers that came in for today’s store opening……Do I really just need to prepare food?’

“So then…all the guests who came in yesterday…”

“They were ghosts.”

Every night starting from 11 o’ clock until 1 o’clock, we will now be open!

altTitles.ja: 無慈悲なヨルに

description.en: The story of Aikawa Kuon, the quiet college student and Shirahane Nanao, the devilish young man continues...

altTitles.ja: 神無き世界のカミサマ活動

altTitles.en: Working for God in a Godless World

altTitles.zh-hk: 無神世界中的神明活動

altTitles.ru: Деятельность Бога в мире без богов

altTitles.es-la: Деятельность Бога в мире без богов

description.en: Yukito, the son of a questionable cult leader, lost his life due to the cult's ridiculous training practices. Now to his surprise, he was reincarnated into another world! It was an ideal world for him without the concept of "God" or "religion" BUT...!
description.es:
El hijo del fundador de un sospechoso culto, Yukito, pierde la vida por culpa del insensato entrenamiento del culto, pero para su sorpresa, ¡se reencarna en otro mundo!
Era un mundo ideal para él, donde no existía el concepto de "Dios" o "religión"... ¡pero!

Comienza la aventura de una singular "reencarnación en otro mundo" que crea una "religión" en un mundo sin Dios.
description.id:
Yukito, putra seorang pemimpin sekte yang dipertanyakan, kehilangan nyawanya karena praktik pelatihan sekte yang konyol. Sekarang yang mengejutkannya, dia bereinkarnasi ke dunia lain!
Itu adalah dunia yang ideal baginya tanpa konsep "Tuhan" atau "agama" TAPI...!

Petualangan unik "bereinkarnasi di dunia lain" dimulai: menciptakan "agama" di dunia tanpa Tuhan?!
description.ja:
怪しげなカルト宗教の教祖の息子・征人は、教団の無茶な修行で命を落とした――はずが、なんと流行りの異世界転生！
そこは「神」や「宗教」の概念のない、征人にとっては理想の世界だった…が!?
神無き世界で「宗教」を作る異色の“異世界転生”譚、開幕!!
description.ru: Отец Юкито — лидер религиозной секты, который совершил обряд над своим сыном под названием «церемония рождения». Всё ради нового лидера религиозной секты, Юкито! Но что-то пошло не так, и в конце-концов наш герой перерождается в другом мире, где нет таких понятий как: Бог и религия, — а порнографические книги сродни детским каракулям. По мере событий Юкито понимает, что на самом деле в этом мире людскую жизнь и смерть решает империя...
description.es-la: Yukito, el hijo de un sospechoso líder de una secta, pierde la vida durante el peligroso rito de la secta y reencarna en otro mundo. Allí, es salvado por los habitantes de una remota aldea y vive felizmente con ellos. Sin embargo, la aldea es un lugar para aquellos que han sido calificados como "anormales" por el Estado Imperial. Los "anormales" son aquellos que tienen "miedo a la muerte". La gente del Reino Imperial carecía del sentido del "miedo a la muerte". Finalmente, los "anormales" iban a ser ejecutados bajo el sistema de "Condena". Yukito intenta desesperadamente salvar a los habitantes de la aldea, pero es incapaz de hacerlo. En ese momento, "Mitama", el dios del culto del que formaba parte Yukito, es convocado a este otro mundo... ¿Será capaz Yukito de sobrevivir en este otro mundo?
description.pt-br: Yukito, filho de um líder de culto questionável, perdeu a vida devido às práticas ridículas de treinamento do culto. Agora, para sua surpresa, ele reencarnou em outro mundo! Era um mundo ideal para ele sem o conceito de "Deus" ou "religião" MAS...! Uma aventura única de "reencarnação em outro mundo" começa: criar uma "religião" em um mundo sem Deus?!

description.en:
The past has changed, but like a fiery comet, he still comes. 

Mugi Hwa, the one without equal, slashed through Murim's skies with his sword, toppling every lord who dared to face him – even Cheonma, Mugeuk Geom’s father. But Mugeuk didn’t accept defeat. Instead, he turned to the forbidden: a time-bending ritual that hurled him into his own past. 

Now, retracing his steps, he races against the clock until Mugi emerges once again. But this time, it's not just about power, but mending old wounds and forging new bonds to unite his people and prepare for the bloodtide to come.
description.ko:
"나를 과거로 보내주시오."

이 시대에서 그를 죽일 수 없다면, 과거로 돌아가면 되리라. 시간을 거스를 수 있는 '회귀대법(回歸大法)'으로 그토록 원하던 과거로 회귀한 한 남자. 

가족도, 친구도, 삶도, 모두 잃었던 '검무극(劍無極)'의 복수를 위한 첫걸음이 시작된다.

description.en: A popular guy who's secretly interested in cosmetics asks to practice makeup on his dull childhood friend... and he ends up looking cute?!
description.id: Seorang siswa SMA yang populer diam-diam suka dunia kosmetik, dan meminta teman masa kecilnya yang dekil untuk latihan dandan… tapi, teman masa kecilnya malah jadi imut!?
description.es-la: Un muchacho popular que en secreto está interesado en cosméticos le pide a su amigo simplón dejarlo maquillarle para practicar… ¿¡Y termina viéndose bello(a)!?
description.pt-br: Um garoto popular que está secretamente interessado em cosméticos pede para praticar maquiagem em seu amigo de infância … e ele acaba ficando uma Linda Garota ?!

description.en:
Ever since Kang Seol was a child, he's had strange dreams where he and several people wear masks while playing "World of Eternity," a board game full of quests and adventures. And although Seol was great at the game, he was never able to win. But now, his dreams have become reality, and humans have become game pieces!

Humanity's only hope is for Seol to recall what he did in his dreams to survive. Even though he's never won, will he be able to turn the tables and finally make his way to victory?
description.ru:
Когда я был маленьким, в своих сновидениях я попадал в иное пространство, так называемый «мир вечности». 
 Во сне я превращался во взрослого человека, одетого в причудливые одежду и маску.
 Теперь пришло время бросать кость. Игра «Мир вечности» , начавшаяся с броска костей , была судьбой? Жизнью? Или, может быть, самим миром?
 Я с удовольствием проводил время, играя в кругу незнакомых мне личностей. Пока однажды я сам не стал фигурой на игровом поле.

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

description.en: After Lu Chen entered the cranial neuron quantum transferring game《Empyrean God Realm》—he found himself stripped of his human character, becoming the weakest wild monster in the game, a "Weak Gnoll." Facing players who are ready to use him to level up, Lu Chen lifts the broken Gnoll club and starts to upgrade from a Lv.1 Gnoll. As Lu Chen keeps on killing more and more species, gaining new talents, and levelling up talents, his status keeps getting enhanced. Normal, Strong, Super strong... Soon enough, he...
